author: potuz
content: Completely off topic but this is the best place to ask anyway. An old cellphone has a camera to read QR codes and a screen to print them. Is there an open source hardware wallet app that I can install in an old phone that I plan to keep air gapped?

author: potuz
content: Should be trivial to write so I'm asking to see if it's out there, cause surely there's people that would be interested
